title: No Name
lyrics:
na mo naki koe no shoutai 
tsurezure mebuku haru no hibiku ao wo 
ienai boku no koukai 
juugen juugen 
mebuku haru no hibiku ao wo 



fuyu ga owaru machikado toke dasu shimobashira mo 

tsunagu sekai 



magaranai ishi wo choudai 

mugen mugen 

kimi to boku no hibiku ao wo 



kienai ai wo choudai 

mugen mugen 

kimi to boku no hibiku ao wo 



yami wo tsugeru ranpu mo nige dasu orion za mo 

tsunagu sekai 



awaku awaku hikaru ki ga tooku naru hodo tooi ano hoshi mo 

sora de tsudoi soshite ten to sen de e ni nari namae ga tsuita 



namae wo kure yo 



kienai ai wo choudai 

mugen mugen 

mebuku haru no hibiku ao wo
